hero.greeting: Hi, I appreciate your interest, I'm Andres
hero.description: Specialized in creating efficient and scalable digital solutions.

about.title: Profile
about.p1: Software developer with ease for integrating into dynamic work environments, standing out for maintaining excellent interpersonal relationships, leadership, teamwork, and a high sense of responsibility and commitment. I possess the ability to perform effectively under pressure and in critical situations.
about.p2: Additionally, I hold a Bachelor's degree in Visual Arts. Although my professional focus is oriented towards the software world, this complementary background strengthens my ability to articulate with other disciplines, improves my understanding of client requirements, and enhances my visual, creative, and marketing capabilities. Likewise, my teaching profile allows me to learn and transmit knowledge effectively, fostering clear communication and optimal teamwork.

jobs.title: Software Development Apprentice
details: Back-end / front-end development with Node.js and Angular, PostgreSQL database management.
Agile Methodologies / Jira, documentation and requirements gathering.
Quality Assurance of all platforms and report automation with Katalon.

jobs.title: Sisben IV Supervisor
details: Field supervisor services to support the implementation of the new beneficiary identification platform.
Management of mobile data capture devices.
Data capture according to DNP manual.

jobs.title: Cultural Affairs Assistant
details: Internal system management for book classification.
